title: Woza weekend: Four Daily Lotto jackpot winners
text:
It's a good start to the weekend for four Daily Lotto players who won R115 152.30 in Friday's Daily Lotto draw.

The next jackpot is estimated at R420 000.

Here are the results for Friday's draw:

Here are the results for Thursday's draw:

In case you missed it, here are the Lotto, Lotto Plus 1 and Lotto Plus 2 results for Wednesday, October 9.

Lotto: 03, 08, 27, 44, 49, 50 Bonus: 07

Lotto Plus 1: 02, 20, 26, 37, 39, 50 Bonus: 51

Lotto Plus 2: 03, 22, 24, 31, 49, 52 Bonus: 02

Download the News24 app via the Play or iTunes App stores and get a free alert moments after each Lotto draw with the winning numbers.

Tap here to download the News24 Android App or here to download the News24 Apple App.
description: It's a good start to the weekend for four Daily Lotto players who won R115 152.30 in Friday's Daily Lotto draw.
